species.name: herdier
descriptions: Herdier is a very smart and friendly Pokémon. So much so that there’s a theory that Herdier was the first Pokémon to partner with people.
It has been living with people for so long that portrayals of it can be found on the walls of caves from long, long ago.
It has black, cape-like fur that is very hard and decreases the amount of damage it receives.
It loyally follows its Trainer’s orders. For ages, they have helped Trainers raise Pokémon.
Its dense black fur grows continuously. The high cost of keeping its hard fur properly groomed makes this a troublesome Pokémon to train.

abilities.name: intimidate
abilities.effect: Lowers opponents' Attack one stage upon entering battle.

abilities.name: sand-rush
abilities.effect: Doubles Speed during a sandstorm.  Protects against sandstorm damage.

abilities.name: scrappy
abilities.effect: Lets the Pokémon's normal and fighting moves hit ghost Pokémon.
